name: The Giant's Fall
description:
BEAST MODE !

As a legendary warrior, you have to defeat one of the great Giants to prove your strength !

--HOW TO PLAY--

  • Use the left/right arrows to dodge the Giant's attack.
  • When you have reach him, use the up arrow to FINISH HIM !

--FOLLOW US!--

  • Thomas Lean [Art & Sound Design] https://twitter.com/ThomasLean .
  • Bulfreak [Game Design & Programming] https://twitter.com/MixBulfreak .

--THANKS TO--

  • Clement Capart (you're the best).
  • https://soundcloud.com/maxime_bondoux (Soundtrack "In Game")
  • Tom Victor.
  • Lucas Prince.
